title: Ancient Rocks Reveal Hidden Climate Motion During Snowball Earth
description: Even when Earth was locked in a global deep freeze, its climate may have kept moving. Ancient rocks reveal seasonal and decade scale cycles beneath the ice during Snowball Earth. Researchers at the University of Southampton have discovered signs in ancient rocks that Earth’s climate continued shifting even during its most extreme ice age, known [...]

title: British Museum removes the word ‘Palestine’ from ancient displays
description: Information placards in the ancient Middle East gallery have been changed.

title: British Museum removes the word ‘Palestinian’ from ancient Middle East displays
description: The museum admitted it had ‘retroactively’ applied the term, including by referring to people in the region as being of ‘Palestinian descent’

title: Look: From ancient forts to desert rock art, 5 UAE sites added to Islamic heritage list
description: Five sites across Dubai and Sharjah have been inscribed on the Islamic World Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization List of Islamic World Tangible Heritage
